faq.title: Find The Right Courses For Your Careers

items.q: How to enroll for a Training Course?
items.a:
• Explore Courses: Browse our catalog to find the track that matches your goals.
  • Register: Open the program page and click “Enroll Now”.
  • Complete Payment: Follow the secure checkout instructions.
  • Start Learning: You’ll receive an email with access details and your live sessions schedule.

items.q: Are the training courses interactive or recorded?
items.a: Live, interactive sessions with practical exercises. Selected sessions may provide recordings for revision.

items.q: Who will be the instructor/coach for my course?
items.a: Industry experts and ICPC-experienced coaches from Coach Academy.

items.q: What placement support do I receive after completing the program?
items.a: Interview preparation, mock interviews, and referrals through our partner network.
